name: cost-per-transaction-percent
description: A chart showing miners revenue as percentage of the transaction volume.

name: hash-rate
description: The estimated number of tera hashes per second (trillions of hashes per second) the Bitcoin network is performing.

name: n-transactions-excluding-popular
full name: Number of Transactions Excluding Popular Addresses
description: The total number of Bitcoin transactions, excluding those involving any of the network's 100 most popular addresses.

name: difficulty
description: A relative measure of how difficult it is to find a new block. The difficulty is adjusted periodically as a function of how much hashing power has been deployed by the network of miners.

name: mempool-size
description: The aggregate size of transactions waiting to be confirmed.

name: blocks-size
description: The total size of all block headers and transactions. Not including database indexes.

name: output-volume
description: The total value of all transaction outputs per day (includes coins returned to the sender as change).

name: avg-block-size
description: The average block size in MB.

name: market-price
description: Average USD market price across major bitcoin exchanges.

name: market-cap
description: The total USD value of bitcoin supply in circulation, as calculated by the daily average market price across major exchanges.

name: n-unique-addresses
description: The total number of unique addresses used on the Bitcoin blockchain.

name: mempool-count
description: The number of transactions waiting to be confirmed.

name: mempool-growth
description: The rate at which the mempool is growing per second.

name: n-transactions-total
description: Total Number of transactions

name: miners-revenue
description: Total value of coinbase block rewards and transaction fees paid to miners.

name: n-transactions-per-block
full name: Average Number Of Transactions Per Block
description: The average number of transactions per block.

name: estimated-transaction-volume
description: The total estimated value of transactions on the Bitcoin blockchain (does not include coins returned to sender as change).

name: median-confirmation-time
description: The median time for a transaction to be accepted into a mined block and added to the public ledger (note: only includes transactions with miner fees).

name: n-transactions
description: The number of daily confirmed Bitcoin transactions.

name: estimated-transaction-volume-usd
description: The Estimated Transaction Value in USD value.

name: cost-per-transaction
description: A chart showing miners revenue divided by the number of transactions.
